Teach me to dance to the beat of Your heart. Teach me to love with Your heart of compassion. Teach me to trust in the word of Your promise. Teach me to hope in the day of Your coming. Teach me to dance to the beat of Your heart.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You wrote the rhythm of life, Created heaven and earth In You is joy without measure. So like a child in Your sight I dance to see Your delight For I was made for Your pleasure, pleasure.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let all my movement express A heart that loves to say yes A will that leaps to obey You Let all my energy blaze To see the joy in Your face Let my whole being praise You, praise You.{/lang-eng}
